meta.Title: BRAIN TEASER [New York Times, Sunday, December 10, 1950]
meta.Author: Jack Luzzatto

across.question: Recipient of U. S. loan aid.
His U. N. job is extended for three years.

down.question: Last six lines of a sonnet.
He died one month after inauguration, 1841.
Vast South African desert region between Orange and Zambesi Rivers.
